title: Typophile Tee Prize Money! Only two weeks left!
content:
Did we mention you still get 3 shirts?   
\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_   
   
Just when you thought you had the contest in the bag,   
the stakes have been raised! Los Angeles-based   
_hyperfoundry_ Apollo 26 ( [http://www.apollo26.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014034928/http:/www.apollo26.com/)) has   
put up $250 in prize money for the winner of the   
Typophile Tee contest.   
   
Only two weeks remain to submit your entry or revise a   
design you've already submitted to the contest. All tee   
submissions must be received by midnight PST on   
Friday, August 30th to qualify. Download the EPS   
template at http://www.typophile.com/downloads/.   
   
We've received tees from designers and design studios   
across the globe and we're as excited as you are to see   
which entry wins. Thanks to everyone for your support   
and publicity, and to our judges from House, HTF, T-26,   
Font Bureau and Letterror for donating their time to help   
us select the winner.   
   
Entries are posted daily at the Typophile Forums.   
 [http://www.typophile.com/forums/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014034928/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/)   
   
Best,   
   
Jared & Joe   
Typophile
author: Joe Pemberton
